data.title: Black Luster Soldier
data.text:
This monster is summoned with the Ritual Magic Card, "Black Luster Ritual". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand. The strongest of all warriors, it suitably wears black. It equals the Blue-Eyes White Dragon in ability. This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Black Luster Ritual". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.
